name: Victor's Non-Dairy Hawaiian Coconut Mochi Cake
author: lazarus
summary: Non-dairy Hawaiian mochi cake. Yum! We love this local Hawaiian taste! Custom made by my amazing father for my milk allergy.
ingredients: ½ (16 ounce) tub vegan margarine (such as Smart Balance®), melted
1 ½ cups coconut flakes (such as Baker's Angel Flake®)
directions: Beat almond milk, sugar, eggs, vegan margarine, and vanilla extract together in a large bowl
Mix in baking powder until no clumps remain
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Add sweet rice flour to the batter; mix well
Add 1 cup coconut flakes and pour batter into the prepared pan
Scatter remaining 1/2 cup coconut on top
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 1 hour
Allow to cool and cut into squares
